title: Domain event as integration contract
summary: Use business events as the stable integration surface between domains and platform capabilities.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Integration fails when contracts are technical or implicit; teams cannot evolve independently.
whenToUse: Multiple consumers need the same signal
whenNotToUse: You need immediate synchronous confirmation for every interaction

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Events must represent business facts, be owned, and have a deprecation policy.

complexity.skillDemand: Event modeling and contract governance skill.
complexity.toolingDemand: Schema registry or contract validation in CI.

realWorldExample.approach: Published policy lifecycle events used by billing and notifications.
realWorldExample.outcome: New consumers added without changing producers.
